briefTitle: A Chronic Obstructive Pulmonary Disease (COPD) Trial Investigating Roflumilast on Safety and Effectiveness in China, Hong Kong and Singapore:
officialTitle: A 6-month, Double-blind, Randomised, Multicenter, Multinational Trial to Investigate the Effect of 500 µg Roflumilast Tablets Once Daily Versus Placebo on Pulmonary Function in Patients With COPD. The ACROSS Trial
summary: The aim of this trial is to determine the efficacy, safety and tolerability of 500 µg Roflumilast tablets once daily in patients with COPD in China, Hong Kong, and Singapore.

primaryOutcome.measure: Change From Baseline in Pre-bronchodilator Forced Expiratory Volume in First Second (FEV1)
